attributes.action: Stop Using Environmental Issues As An Excuse To Unfairly Tax The Population
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time that the government stop using 'environmental issues' as an excuse to charge the public ridiculous amounts in tax, especially on essentials such as petrol, diesel, gas, & electricity.
Average earning families, especially in rural areas, can no longer afford to keep lining the pockets of Downing St.
I for one am sick of the usual rubbish that "it is part of the government policy to reduce carbon emmisions".
It is nothing more than an excuse to further tax us for the essential things we need.
ENOUGH IS ENOUGH!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
